SetUpPage.name_caption: How would you like to be called?
SetUpPage.weight_caption: We will calculate your recommended daily protein intake based on your weight.

InfoIntroPage.fruit_and_veg_info:
1 unit is 80g of fruit & veg
≈ the size of a fist 
or a tennis ball
InfoIntroPage.protein_info:
1 unit is 7g of protein
≈ 1/3 palm-size meat
or 1/3 deck of cards-size meat
InfoIntroPage.benefits_info:
Fruit and veg support heart, gut and brain health.
Protein provides energy and strengthen the immune system, muscle mass, bone, hair and skin health.
